p: After 5 days (Toscana and Arbia virus) and 7 day (Sicilian and Adana virus), the microplates were read under an inverted microscope, and the presence (neutralization titer at 20, 40, 80 and 160) or absence (no neutralization) of cytopathic effect was noted. Cut-off value for positivity was set at titre â‰¥ 20 [ 15, 18, 20, 21].
